title: 35mm Tires, 62t Chainrings, and More Tech of Paris-Roubaix 2025: Part One
content:
Details on the teams opting for a 35mm wide tyre, Josh Tarling's massive 62t chainring, and one of the best top tube cue sheets we've ever seen.

Read the full article at 35mm Tires, 62t Chainrings, and More Tech of Paris-Roubaix 2025: Part One on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
